name: chopperlift
description:
my first game ..made with  Clickteam Fusion.

first part is a chopper rescue ..you rescue the people and take them  to the red cross center you have to land to unload the people ..you can carry 10 people at a time but if you wreck you will lose all on board

use the arrow keys to move and the spacebar to shoot (will shoot what ever direction you are moving)the birds for 5 points each ..you can pick your speed ..slow..medium..fast ...

next part is space rescue where you fly a spaceship to pickup aliens and take them to the unloading platform ...you can carry 20 aliens at a time

use the arrow keys to move
